image_summary: A black industrial electronic control unit or PLC (Programmable Logic Controller) module shown from multiple angles. The device features a modular design with stacked rectangular sections, mounting tabs on top, connection ports or slots on the front face, and what appears to be a small label or indicator on one side panel. The unit has a professional industrial appearance with clean geometric lines.

room_layout_estimate.dominant_orientation: front-facing with left side visible in primary view

side access for maintenance or wiring
